data.name: Nerg Loves Them
data.detailed_description:
A surreal action platformer that focuses on the concept of balance. Switch between 2 playable lizards and harmonize their strenghts and weaknesses.


Key features
  • Fast paced action combat: Switch characters to go ranged or mele, extract love from your defeated enemies and your surroundings to gain temporary damage boosts. One character focuses on patience and accuracy the other power and madness.
  • Linear levels: Old school linearity, get to the end past all the enemies and platforming hazards. Get locked in certain places and defeat the enemies to progress.
  • Personalized villains: Most bosses dont appear out of nowhere without the player knowing who they are first. They appear throughout levels hindering your progress with different kinds of shenanigans so that when you finally do fight them youve got a damn good reason to.
  • Original soundtrack focused on synths mixed with surreal weirdness.
  • Nonsense, lots of nonsense.
